item.name: category_select
item.message: Please select one of the below categories.

item.name: description_to_short
item.message: The description should be at least 3 characters long

item.name: mod_description
item.message: With this module you are able to administer the downloads.

item.message: Please select a category, where do you want to find the download

item.name: select_internal_resource
item.message: Please select the path to the file, which you want to upload

item.message: Please type in the external resource for the file

item.name: type_in_link_title
item.message: The link title should be at least 3 characters long
